name: skeleton
description: Skeleton is a model view controller(mvc) pattern built on slim3.

scripts.dev: node node_modules/.bin/sponge scripts && node node_modules/.bin/sponge sass
scripts.pretest: phplint app/**/*.php && phplint bootstrap/app.php && phplint config/*.php && phplint routes/*.php && phplint system/*.php

author: rodrigogalura3rd@gmail.com
